content: with a slip_stitch instead take out the hook insert the hook from back to front into the top of the first half_double_crochet and pull up a loop we had a similar ending in round #1 magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #7 make 96 bpdc all around close the round with a slip_stitch round #8 make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height and then repeat 12 times make 1 puff around the bpdc 1 chain skip the next bpdc 5 single_crochet in the next 5 bpdc skip the next bpdc 1 chain close the round with a slip_stitch in the top of the 1st puff we have 12 puff stitches each two are separated by skipped bpdc s 1 chain and 5 single_crochet s between them round #9 we start this round at the top of the puff repeat 12 times 3 tc in the top of the puff 1 tc and 2 double_crochet in 1ch-space now we will work the stitches of round #7 there are 7 bpdc s between puff stiches ◦ make 1 fphdc around the 2nd bpdc of round #7 ◦ make 1 fpsc around the 3rd and another one around the 5th bpdc of round #7 altogether there are 2 fpsc s made ◦ make 1 fphdc around the 6th bpdc of round #7 2 double_crochet and 1 tc in the next 1ch-space close the round with a slip_stitch and make a slip_stitch in the 2nd tc on the top of the puff we have 12 petals of 2 double_crochet+ 5 tc + 2 double_crochet separated by 4 front post stitches made into round #7 round #10 we start this round in the 2nd middle tc made on top of the puff repeat 12 times 2 double_crochet into the middle tc of round #9 make 3 chain and slip_stitch into the 2nd double_crochet we ve made a picot then one more double_crochet into the same middle tc 3 double_crochet into the next 3 stitches 3 double_crochet into the last double_crochet of the petal fpsc around the 4th bpdc of round #7 remember we used 2nd 3rd 5th and 6th bpdc in round #9 so 4th bpdc was skipped then 3 double_crochet into the first double_crochet of the next petal 3 double_crochet into the next 3 stitches close the round with a slip_stitch slip_stitch to the picot and pull the yarn to the wrong side through the hole made by the picot we have 12 finished petals with picots on top between the petals there are fpsc s fastened to round #7 magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #11 this round will be made on the wrong side of our work and it will be invisible from the right side its only role will be to support the next rounds make 6 chain to climb down from the picot make 1 single_crochet to the top of the puff
